name: yarr
tagline: A fast and keyboard friendly RSS reader
description: yarr (yet another RSS reader) is a self-hosted web-based feed reader. It fetches RSS/Atom feeds on a schedule, supports tags and search, and presents content in a clean, keyboard-friendly UI.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Group feeds with custom tags for better organization and filtered reading views

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find articles across all subscribed feeds using keyword search with instant results

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Migrate feed subscriptions from other readers or backup your collection in standard format

features.title: Minimal Interface
features.description: Focus on content with a clean, distraction-free design that prioritizes readability
